data.title: Candle Grazia
data.meta_description: A tribute to Grazia Deledda, the author from Nuoro, the first Italian woman to be awarded the Nobel Prize. An old courtyard in the centre of Nuoro, in the Barbagia area in the heart of Sardinia, a summer afternoon in the shade of a lemon tree, which adds a touch of sparkle as it blends with the inebriating scent of myrtle, the heart of the fragrance... All sweetened by a base of notes such as amber, patchouli and cedar wood. Wild, strong and irresistible, yet at the same time gentle, feminine and elegant.
